name: Custom Socials Share
author: Nagaraj

sections.installation:
1. Download the source folder from here.
  2. Upload the folder ‘custom-socials-share’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  3. Activate ‘Custom Socials Share’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.description:
Custom Social Share buttons for your Custom blockquotes tags are including sharing button, Facebook, whatsapp, and telegran and copy to clipboard.. also added download link for block images.

Features

  • Social Share buttons in blocks
  • Facebook, whatsapp, telegram, copy to clipboard.
  • Download Button
